instructions: Tap the New Note button , then enter your text. The first line of the note becomes the note s title. To change the formatting, tap the Text Styles button . You can apply a heading style, bold or italic font, a bulleted or numbered list, and more. To save the note, tap Done.

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Power saving . Tap Power saving mode. Tap the Power saving mode switch to turn on. If desired, select the Restrict background data check box. Tap Restrict performance. Tap the Restrict performance switch to turn on. Select or clear the check boxes for the following options: CPU performance Screen output Turn off key light Turn off GPS To turn off Restrict performance, tap the Restrict performance switch. To turn off Power saving mode, tap the Power saving mode switch.

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Power saving . Tap Ultra power saving mode . Tap the Ultra power saving mode switch to turn on. Review the disclaimer, then tap OK . Update additional settings as desired. To turn off, tap Menu > Turn off ultra power saving mode > OK.
